title: Gold 3 support. LFT serious Ranked 5s, LFP gold+ adc for duo ranked
body:
Looking for a serious ranked 5s team, My main goal is to improve my champion pool and overall game play so team must be serious about climbing.

IGN:borisdec
Division: gold 3.
I'm available every night
Currently main leona/sona, mastering thresh/nami/bruam. Can play most supports decently.

Also looking for a gold+ adc Looking to improve and climb. Must have voice communication, skype/curse voice

Add and message me if interested.
